page.title: 10NEWS - SCHOOL FETE
page.content: The{fete}opens and you can buy a Lucky Programme at the gate for 10p which could win you 5 pounds. At the gate you will see the huge crane, the main attraction of the day. It carries you high above the village in its bucket and gives{magnificent views. There are lots of side shows like Mr Big Mouth where you have to throw a ping pong ball into a mouth shape. You can also have a lucky dip and pull a prize out of a tub. Other{side shows are Tombolla stall, books, a jumping castle, throwing a welly. You can have pony rides and buy ice creams, teas and candy floss. Many children enter the Fancy Dress Competition and bring along their pets for a show. The winners get money and rosettes. There is a dancing display. What a lovely way to raise 550 pounds for our school.
